title: TREX Introduces TREX SIGNATURE DECKING | ProBuilder - Pro Builder
summary: Trex, a leader in composite decking, has introduced its new premium product, Trex Signature decking. This innovation features a realistic woodgrain aesthetic, exceeding previous composite decking offerings in terms of beauty and performance.  The decking is sustainably made from recycled and reclaimed materials, positioning it as a top-of-the-line product that caters to environmentally conscious consumers.

title: The European startups transforming supply chains, according to VCs - Sifted
summary: The article discusses the growing trend of startups focused on making supply chains more efficient and environmentally friendly. It features three European investors who highlight specific companies they believe are making significant contributions to this field, including Ecoplanet for energy management, Medishout for healthcare logistics, and Root Global for sustainable food supply chains.
product_or_process: B2B energy platform for optimizing energy consumption and procurement
